item.description:
Hi,

I booked the 1:30 PM tee time for a 4some (Sunday) at the Trull Brook golf course in Tewksbury, MA. You may check out the site for more info: http://www.trullbrook...

The cost is $42 walking.

Let me know by Saturday noon if you will play so that I can confirm the number of players with the pro shop.

Let us meet at the proshop area at 1:10PM.

Mary

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Sunday early afternoon golf?
